languages.text: "Людей было бы больше, если бы Ризза не была такой осторожной стервой, а Иеронимус сделал милость и заткнулся со своими проповедями..." {n}Скрипнув зубами, Владайм тихо добавляет:{/n} "Если бы мстить за него сюда не явилась толпа фанатиков, я давно отправил бы доброго епископа на круг".

"We would have greater numbers if Ryzza wasn't so damnably cautious, and Hieronymus did us a favour and shut his preaching trap..." {n}Vladaym grits his teeth and adds quietly,{/n} "I would've thrown the good reverend for a loop long ago if it weren't for the fanatical mob that would show up here to avenge him."
languages.original_text: "Людей было бы больше, если бы Ризза не была такой осторожной стервой, а Иеронимус сделал милость и заткнулся со своими проповедями..." {n}Скрипнув зубами, Владайм тихо добавляет:{/n} "Если бы мстить за него сюда не явилась толпа фанатиков, я давно отправил бы доброго епископа на круг".

traits.locale_text: "We would have greater numbers if Ryzza wasn't so damnably cautious and Hieronymus did us a favour and shut his preaching trap..." {n}Vladaym grits his teeth and adds quietly,{/n} "I would've long sent the good reverend to the circle if it weren't for the fanatical mob that would show up here to avenge him."

"We would have greater numbers if Ryzza wasn't so damnably cautious and Hieronymus did us a favour and shut his preaching trap..." {n}Vladaym grits his teeth and adds quietly,{/n} "I would've long sent the good reverend to the circle if it weren't for the fanatical mob that would show up here to avenge him."

"We would have greater numbers if Ryzza wasn't so damnably cautious, and Hieronymus did us a favour and shut his preaching trap..." {n}Vladaym grits his teeth and adds quietly,{/n} "I would've long thrown the good reverend for a loop if it weren't for the fanatical mob that would show up here to avenge him."

"We would have greater numbers if Ryzza wasn't so damnably cautious, and Hieronymus did us a favour and shut his preaching trap..." {n}Vladaym grits his teeth and adds quietly,{/n} "I would've long thrown the good reverend for a loop if it weren't for the fanatical mob that would show up here to avenge him."

"We would have greater numbers if Ryzza wasn't so damnably cautious, and Hieronymus did us a favour and shut his preaching trap..." {n}Vladaym grits his teeth and adds quietly,{/n} "I would've thrown the good reverend for a loop long ago if it weren't for the fanatical mob that would show up here to avenge him."

"We would have greater numbers if Ryzza wasn't so damnably cautious, and Hieronymus did us a favour and shut his preaching trap..." {n}Vladaym grits his teeth and adds quietly,{/n} "I would've thrown the good reverend for a loop long ago if it weren't for the fanatical mob that would show up here to avenge him."

languages.text: “如果莱萨别那么战战兢兢，如果希罗尼穆斯可以帮我们个忙，别再到处布道，那我们这里还会有更多人……”{n}弗拉迪姆咬紧了牙，低声补充道。{/n}“如果不是因为那个好好先生有一群狂热的暴徒会为他报仇，我老早就把他从气闸里扔出去了。”
languages.original_text: "We would have greater numbers if Ryzza wasn't so damnably cautious, and Hieronymus did us a favour and shut his preaching trap..." {n}Vladaym grits his teeth and adds quietly,{/n} "I would've thrown the good reverend for a loop long ago if it weren't for the fanatical mob that would show up here to avenge him."

traits.locale_text: “如果莱萨别那么战战兢兢，如果希罗尼穆斯可以帮我们个忙，别再到处布道，那我们这里还会有更多人……”{n}弗拉迪姆咬紧了牙，低声补充道。{/n}“如果不是因为那个好好先生有一群狂热的暴徒会为他报仇，我老早就把他从气闸里扔出去了。”

languages.text: 「ライツァがこれほど慎重じゃなかったら、もう少し人数がいただろうし、ヒエロニムスも説教の罠を閉じてくれたはずだ…」{n}ヴラダイムは歯を食いしばりながら、静かに付け加えた。{/n}「復讐を企む頭のおかしい暴徒が現れなければ、私はとっくに善良な牧師にショックを与えていただろう」
languages.original_text: "We would have greater numbers if Ryzza wasn't so damnably cautious, and Hieronymus did us a favour and shut his preaching trap..." {n}Vladaym grits his teeth and adds quietly,{/n} "I would've thrown the good reverend for a loop long ago if it weren't for the fanatical mob that would show up here to avenge him."

traits.locale_text: 「ライツァがこれほど慎重じゃなかったら、もう少し人数がいただろうし、ヒエロニムスも説教の罠を閉じてくれたはずだ…」{n}ヴラダイムは歯を食いしばりながら、静かに付け加えた。{/n}「復讐を企む頭のおかしい暴徒が現れなければ、私はとっくに善良な牧師にショックを与えていただろう」

languages.text: «Tendríamos un mayor número si Ryzza no fuera tan prudente y Hieronymus nos hiciera un favor y pusiera fin a su tapadera de predicador...». {n}Vladaym aprieta los dientes y añade en voz baja:{/n} «Hace tiempo que habría hecho desaparecer al reverendo si no fuera por la turba de fanáticos que se presentaría aquí para vengarlo».
languages.original_text: "We would have greater numbers if Ryzza wasn't so damnably cautious, and Hieronymus did us a favour and shut his preaching trap..." {n}Vladaym grits his teeth and adds quietly,{/n} "I would've thrown the good reverend for a loop long ago if it weren't for the fanatical mob that would show up here to avenge him."

traits.locale_text: «Tendríamos un mayor número si Ryzza no fuera tan prudente y Hieronymus nos hiciera un favor y pusiera fin a su tapadera de predicador...». {n}Vladaym aprieta los dientes y añade en voz baja:{/n} «Hace tiempo que habría hecho desaparecer al reverendo si no fuera por la turba de fanáticos que se presentaría aquí para vengarlo».

languages.text: "Wir wären noch mehr, wäre Ryzza nicht so verflucht vorsichtig und würde Hieronymus uns den Gefallen tun, mal seine Predigerfresse zu halten ..." {n}Vladaym knirscht mit den Zähnen und fügt leise hinzu:{/n} "Ich hätte den guten Reverend schon längst auf Spazierflug geschickt, würde danach nicht ein fanatischer Mob hier auftauchen, um ihn zu rächen."
languages.original_text: "We would have greater numbers if Ryzza wasn't so damnably cautious, and Hieronymus did us a favour and shut his preaching trap..." {n}Vladaym grits his teeth and adds quietly,{/n} "I would've thrown the good reverend for a loop long ago if it weren't for the fanatical mob that would show up here to avenge him."

traits.locale_text: "Wir wären noch mehr, wäre Ryzza nicht so verflucht vorsichtig und würde Hieronymus uns den Gefallen tun, mal seine Predigerfresse zu halten ..." {n}Vladaym knirscht mit den Zähnen und fügt leise hinzu:{/n} "Ich hätte den guten Reverend schon längst auf Spazierflug geschickt, würde danach nicht ein fanatischer Mob hier auftauchen, um ihn zu rächen."

languages.text: « Nous serions plus nombreux si Ryzza n'était pas aussi prudente et si Hiéronymus voulait bien nous faire le plaisir de fermer son clapet... » {n}Vladaym serre les dents, puis continue à voix basse :{/n} « J'aurais envoyé ce cher révérend au rebut il y a bien longtemps, s'il n'y avait pas toute une foule de fanatiques prêts à le venger. »
languages.original_text: "We would have greater numbers if Ryzza wasn't so damnably cautious, and Hieronymus did us a favour and shut his preaching trap..." {n}Vladaym grits his teeth and adds quietly,{/n} "I would've thrown the good reverend for a loop long ago if it weren't for the fanatical mob that would show up here to avenge him."

traits.locale_text: « Nous serions plus nombreux si Ryzza n'était pas aussi prudente et si Hiéronymus voulait bien nous faire le plaisir de fermer son clapet... » {n}Vladaym serre les dents, puis continue à voix basse :{/n} « J'aurais envoyé ce cher révérend au rebut il y a bien longtemps, s'il n'y avait pas toute une foule de fanatiques prêts à le venger. »

languages.text: "Ryzza bu denli temkinli davranmasa, Hieronymus da çenesini kapatmayı bilse sayımız daha çok olacaktı..." {n}Vladaym diş gıcırdatıp sessizce ekliyor:{/n} "Bir sürü bağnaz kapıma dikilecek olmasa muhteremin aklını çoktan almıştım."
languages.original_text: "We would have greater numbers if Ryzza wasn't so damnably cautious, and Hieronymus did us a favour and shut his preaching trap..." {n}Vladaym grits his teeth and adds quietly,{/n} "I would've thrown the good reverend for a loop long ago if it weren't for the fanatical mob that would show up here to avenge him."

traits.locale_text: "Ryzza bu denli temkinli davranmasa, Hieronymus da çenesini kapatmayı bilse sayımız daha çok olacaktı..." {n}Vladaym diş gıcırdatıp sessizce ekliyor:{/n} "Bir sürü bağnaz kapıma dikilecek olmasa muhteremin aklını çoktan almıştım."
